translation: BG 13.1:Arjun said, “O Keshav, I wish to understand what areprakṛitiandpuruṣh, and what arekṣhetraandkṣhetrajña? I also wish to know what is true knowledge, and what is the goal of this knowledge?
commentary: *[1]In some editions of the Bhagavad Gita, this verse has been omitted, and the next verse figures as the first verse of the thirteenth chapter.
